evidence.quote: I refuse to speak other any other language in English for two very important reasons

evidence.quote: he also has to provide drama for her he also has to be entertaining for her... if there's never any drama because drama is excitement then they're going to naturally try and find drama somewhere else

evidence.quote: I'm perfect in English so why would I speak in a language which I don't speak as well as in English
